events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles specifically for software development opportunities.
A recruiter who specializes in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be in touch soon.
Our technical recruiter completed the initial screening and is impressed with your background and skill set.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions and providing additional details about your experience.
Your first technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th, where you will discuss coding challenges and system design.
You completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing strong problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your cultural fit and further employment details on May 10th.
The HR interview went very well, and we appreciate your enthusiasm and alignment with our company values.
We have formally extended an offer for the Software Engineer role, including competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and asked some questions about the onboarding process.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started with orientation sessions and access to necessary systems.
The hiring process is now completed successfully, and you are fully onboarded as a valued member of our engineering team.
